resources.string: Click on the \"Rules\" button to go to the rules screen.
Click on the \"Settings\" button to go to the settings screen.
Click on the \"Games\" button to go to the games screen.
This is the \"Fruit Record\" panel, and it shows your current record.
This is a \"Bonus\", it appears 1 time per game, click on it to get the bonus.
Click the \"Back\" button to return to the previous screen.
Move the progress bar left and right to adjust the Music volume.
Move the progress bar left and right to adjust the Sound volume.
Click the \"Back\" button to return to the previous screen.
This is a table of possible winnings.
To start the wheel, press the \"GO\" button.
This is how a blocked level is marked, it can be seen by the red outline and the Castle on the right, and above the level there is information that this level will open if you set a record of 20,000+
This is how the unlocked level is marked, it can be seen by the white outline, click on it to go to the \"Game\" screen.

This is the game screen where the main action takes place, your task is to take the falling fruits and combine the same ones if you combine a pair of 3+ fruits they will explode beautifully and bring you points that will increase your record.
